introduction.description: I’m a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm building Maintainable, Scalable and Reliable applications at

aboutMe.title: About Me
content: A typical geek who balances between "May the Force be with You" and "May the Mass-times-Acceleration be with you," Love Programming, Solving Puzzles, Maths, Physics, and Movies. In a mathematical sense, Everything Suhail loves, falls in the union of anything that has learning.

I love Problem-Solving in perhaps the most straightforward way, thanks to my laziness, but on the other hand, if the problem is not solved efficiently, my need for perfection kicks in. I think that defines me more than anything could do.

description: Worked on Visio Online, a web-based diagramming tool with 1.2M+ daily active users.
Leveraged TypeScript, React, Redux and Jest to build and test various components for a feature in the vast client-side codebase, which is part of 1JS
Enhanced client-side approximation engine for optimal performance and functionality of the feature

Software Developerin the official coding club and web team of NIT Trichy, which produces and maintains most of the web and app development for various activities, festivals and admin-related projects in the college.
Designed, Developed and Deployed production ready websites and applications accessed by 10,000s of unique visitors every year.
Head of the Web Operations team of Aaveg, the annual inter-hostel sports and cultural extravaganza of NIT, Trichy.
Lead a team of 7 to develop and deploy websites and apps for 1,000+freshers.

projects.name: Arcadia '23
projects.description: A strategy-based game where you collect powerful mini-conquerors (or minicons) with special and unique abilities and challenge opponents

projects.name: Student Dashboard
projects.description: A dashboard for students to register for mess and hostel, manage clubs and bills, and requisite documents.

projects.name: Fotos
projects.description: A photo sharing platform with face recognition to filter out user’s photos from a set of photos. Qualified for Microsoft Engage 2022 as a Project.

otherProjects.title: Delta Winter of Code
otherProjects.description: Built a site which allow organizations to post projects and invite users to be mentors. It also allows users to apply forthe projects as mentee.

otherProjects.title: Aaveg Questionnaire
otherProjects.description: Built an Express server with an MongoDB database along with a Redis caching layerin NodeJS with TypeScript to facilitate the splitting of 1000+ of users into 5 different squads.

otherProjects.title: Ingenium
otherProjects.description: Revamped an existing PHP server into an Express server with MySQL database using the sequelize orm. Developed an Intuitive and Responsive UI with Plain HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch.
getInTouch.content: Although I’m not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll try my best to get back to you!
